contentrichtext.text: '''James Farmer''' may refer to: * [[James Farmer (politician)]] (1823â€“95), representing Marsden (and other electorates) in the New Zealand Parliament * [[James L. Farmer, Sr.]], first African-American Texan to earn a doctorate * [[James L. Farmer, Jr.]], one of the leaders of the U.S. Civil Rights Movement in the 1950s and 1960s, son of the above * [[Jim Farmer]], American basketball player * [[James N. Farmer]], online education and WordPress pioneer, founder of Edublogs {{hndis|Farmer, James}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Farmer, James}}
